forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
